content: Hi, I need to fix some electrical issues at my house. Can you help me schedule someone?
Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Service. Before we proceed, may I have your name, please?
It's Mike. By the way, I think I might have dialed the wrong number. I was aiming to reach a plumbing company in downtown.

I see, Mike. Unfortunately, you have reached XYZ Home Service, and we handle plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services but might not cover downtown area. Would you like me to check if we service your location, or would you prefer me to mark this as a wrong number for future contact?
Oh, okay. Yes, I guess I wonâ€™t be able to get a plumber from you then. Please mark this as a wrong number. Thanks!
Understood, Mike. I will mark this number as a wrong contact for our records. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
